name: Picnic with Melody
description:
Picnic with Melody is a game about a lumberjack who chops his way through a forest... What awaits him on the other side?

Controls: Spacebar / Touch

Created by @mikekrolik, @ShakeMeLuzifer, and @artemfairon in a day for the Ubisoft Berlin Game Jam 2021.

The game was inspired by the concert of Ian Fisher and Ryan Thomas Carpenter the three of us visited the night before the jam.

Third-party assets used in the game:

Chopping Wood by Mike Koenig
Button or switch from zapsplat
Countryside ambience from zapsplat
Door Knocks from freesound.org
